body:
Hello!

Is it possible to point IDEA flutter project to a custom gems home? iOS flutter launcher does not have env vars options.
Running from command line directly with flutter works fine.

```
export GEM_HOME=...
flutter run
# or
open ios/Runner.xcworkspace
```

running through IDEA launcher, getting the following error, which is expected as no way to specify GEM_HOME 

```
Launching lib/main.dart on my iPhone in debug mode...
Automatically signing iOS for device deployment using specified development team in Xcode project: XXXXXXXXXX
Warning: CocoaPods is installed but broken. Skipping pod install.
  You appear to have CocoaPods installed but it is not working.
  This can happen if the version of Ruby that CocoaPods was installed with is different from the one being used to invoke it.
  This can usually be fixed by re-installing CocoaPods.
```

## Version info

```
$ flutter doctor -v
[âœ“] Flutter (Channel stable, 2.2.1, on Mac OS X 10.15.7 19H1217 darwin-x64, locale en-GB)
    â€¢ Flutter version 2.2.1 at /usr/local/Caskroom/flutter/2.2.1/flutter
    â€¢ Framework revision 02c026b03c (12 days ago), 2021-05-27 12:24:44 -0700
    â€¢ Engine revision 0fdb562ac8
    â€¢ Dart version 2.13.1

[âœ“] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK version 30.0.3)
    â€¢ Android SDK at /Users/-/Library/Android/sdk
    â€¢ Platform android-30, build-tools 30.0.3
    â€¢ Java binary at: /Users/-/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/-/Android Studio.app/Contents/jre/jdk/Contents/Home/bin/java
    â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.8+10-b944.6916264)
    â€¢ All Android licenses accepted.

[âœ“] Xcode - develop for iOS and macOS
    â€¢ Xcode at /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer
    â€¢ Xcode 12.4, Build version 12D4e
    â€¢ CocoaPods version 1.10.1

[âœ“] Chrome - develop for the web
    â€¢ Chrome at /Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome

[âœ“] Android Studio (version 4.2)
    â€¢ Android Studio at /Users/-/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/-/Android Studio.app/Contents
    â€¢ Flutter plugin can be installed from:
      ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/9212-flutter
    â€¢ Dart plugin can be installed from:
      ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6351-dart
    â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.8+10-b944.6916264)

[âœ“] IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition (version 2021.1.2)
    â€¢ IntelliJ at /Users/-/Applications/JetBrains Toolbox/IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate.app
    â€¢ Flutter plugin version 57.0.5
    â€¢ Dart plugin version 211.7233

[âœ“] Connected device (1 available)
    â€¢ Chrome (web) â€¢ chrome â€¢ web-javascript â€¢ Google Chrome 91.0.4472.77

â€¢ No issues found!
```

Thank you!

comment_data.body:
We plan to add this feature, but it isn't implemented yet.

Closing, since this is a dup of #5292.

title: Custom GEM_HOME and IDEA iOS launcher
